definition: to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.
sentences.chinese: 都恆心遵守使徒的教訓，彼此交接，擘餅，祈禱。

sentences.english: It covers what the apostle John saw in a vision on the Island of Patmos.
sentences.chinese: 它記錄了使徒約翰在拔摩海島所看到的異象。

sentences.english: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
sentences.chinese: 彼得和衆使徒回答說，順從神，不順從人，是應當的。

sentences.english: Jesus did this with the Apostle Peter.
sentences.chinese: 主耶穌也是這樣鼓勵使徒彼得。

sentences.english: Look on chapter 7 of the Didache.
sentences.chinese: 看《十二使徒遺傳》的第7章。

sentences.english: For I reckon that I am not at all behind the very best apostles.
sentences.chinese: 但我想，我一點不在那些最大的使徒以下。

sentences.english: That's what the apostle Paul taught the church at Colosse.
sentences.chinese: 這正是使徒保羅對歌羅西教會的教導。

sentences.english: She took on the mission of exterminating the apostles.
sentences.chinese: 她承接了殲滅使徒的使命。

sentences.english: And this is the way The Acts of Apostles begins.
sentences.chinese: 這就是使徒行傳的開頭。

sentences.english: He got one apostle to say he did not even know Christ.
sentences.chinese: 他曾抓住一個使徒，叫他說他不認得主。

sentences.english: Luke wrote both the Gospel of Luke and the book of Acts.
sentences.chinese: 路加寫的書有路加福音和使徒行傳。

sentences.english: He who speaks against the truth of apostolical pardons, let him be anathema and accursed.
sentences.chinese: 他對誰講的真理使徒的赦免，讓他被詛咒和詛咒。

sentences.english: The Apostles' Creed contains a short summary of Jesus' life.
sentences.chinese: 使徒信經中包含有耶穌一生的剪影。

sentences.english: And when the hour was come, he sat down, and the twelve apostles with him.
sentences.chinese: 時候到了，耶穌坐席，使徒也和他同坐。

sentences.english: For such are false apostles, deceitful workers, transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 那等人是假使徒，行事詭詐，裝作基督使徒的模樣。

sentences.english: However, she did report a vision of Jesus at Mount Olivet with three Apostles.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在橄欖山，她和三個使徒宣稱看到耶穌顯靈。

definition: Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
blood relations/one's own flesh and blood/kin
Titan (race of deities in Greek mythology, moon of Saturn etc)
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
